reviewText: Bought this for a friend to help her groom her new Poms and she reported that it was terrific.  Very helpful for her to get the hang of and the booklet that comes with it is a great help as well!

Finally, I found a great video that teaches the secrets of grooming a show Pom. Now I have the skills to groom like a pro. The video has simple directions explaining different styling techniques and how to use shears or scissors. Great value and fast shipping! Thank you!

The video is very easy to follow.  As a beginner groomer, it was great to see where to begin. I learned a lot that I didn't know.  The DVD took the fear out of me grooming my Pom.  My first try turned out pretty well.  I'm sure with more practice and watching the DVD - I'll get better each time.
Finally, a dvd that tells me how to properly groom my Pomeranian.  Easy to follow along and learn from a professional breeder and show person.  Includes so much I never knew.  Very helpful.
Great video!  Wish I had this 5 years ago.

This DVD *DOES NOT* teach your Pomeranian how to groom itself. The dog just stares at the screen, barking at the other dogs. I gave the dog a brush ... she chewed it. I gave the dog a tooth brush ... she pooped on it.
Perhaps if the DVD was in her native language, the dog might have picked up some grooming habits, but as for now, the DVD is worthless.
Very good. Well described and the video was clear and audible. It was easy to follow and had a helpful booklet as well.

I loved this video.  It is an easy to follow and understand on grooming.  I have a pom and learned some great techniques that I will be using when grooming my own dogs. Excellent video and I highly recommend it for any trips on groom a pom or other small breeds,
